official_title: To provide that the United States District Court for the Judicial District of New Jersey shall be held at Paterson, New Jersey, in addition to those places currently provided by law.

summary.text: Provides that the U.S. District Court for the District of New Jersey shall be held in Paterson, New Jersey, in addition to those places currently provided by law.

titles.title: To provide that the United States District Court for the Judicial District of New Jersey shall be held at Paterson, New Jersey, in addition to those places currently provided by law.
